agency_name: COALITION TO ELIMINATE THE ABUSE OF SUBSTANCES
agency_desc: A nonprofit coalition of organizations working to prevent and reduce substance use and addictions among youth and adults in Scott County.
site_name: COALITION TO ELIMINATE THE ABUSE OF SUBSTANCES
service_description: Provides forum for individuals and organizations to develop strategies that prevent and reduce substance use in Scott County.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_eligibility: Individuals, community leaders, and organizations working to prevent and reduce substance use and addictions

agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignment, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades PreK-12

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency that provides assistance for any person who is parenting or pregnant.
service_description: Offers assistance to anyone who is parenting or preparing to parenting. Services include education and social services. Helps with gently used baby clothes, strollers, formula, and other baby items. Diapers and wipes are available on a weekly basis.
site_details: Walk in.
site_schedule: Mon noon-4pm; Tues and Wed 10am-3:30pm; Thurs 1:30pm-4:30pm
Mon noon-4pm; Tues and Wed 10am-3:30pm; Thurs 1:30pm-4:30pm
Mon noon-4pm; Tues and Wed 10am-3:30pm; Thurs 1:30pm-4:30pm
Mon noon-4pm; Tues and Wed 10am-3:30pm; Thurs 1:30pm-4:30pm
Mon noon-4pm; Tues and Wed 10am-3:30pm; Thurs 1:30pm-4:30pm
Mon noon-4pm; Tues and Wed 10am-3:30pm; Thurs 1:30pm-4:30pm
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Serves as a membership organization that promotes business and economic development.
service_description: Serves as a membership organization that promotes business and economic development in Scott County.
site_details: Call for information.
site_eligibility: Membership required; call for information.

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides services to those who have been victims of crime.
service_description: Provides advocacy services for victims of any crime. Gives victims the opportunity to complete a Victim Impact Statement to submit to prosecutors prior to sentencing or plea negotiations. Additional assistance provided to victims in the filing of protective orders, court accompaniment, crisis intervention, case management, protective order assistance, and mobile advocacy. Special emphasis placed on victims of domestic violence and/or sexual assault. Services may include safety planning and help applying for victims compensation benefits.
site_details: Call for information.
site_eligibility:
○Living in Scott County 
○Victims of any crime

agency_desc: An Indiana Area Agency on Aging (Area 14) organization that provides information, referral, and other services to seniors and those with disabilities.
site_name: LIFESPAN RESOURCES AT SCOTTSBURG BACALA SENIOR CENTER
service_description: Provides a hot, sit-down lunch and fellowship every weekday for area seniors. Meal includes entree, vegetables, low sugar desserts, whole grain breads, and beverages. Reservations required at least 24 hours in advance.
site_details: First visit: Registration required (free) -- Call one week in advance to make a reservation. -- Visit website, https://www.lsr14.org/congregate-centers, for monthly lunch menu.
site_eligibility: Age 60 or older -OR- Individuals with disabilities

agency_desc: Represents the state of Indiana in felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions, conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic violations, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
service_description: Provides advocacy, information, referrals, and support services to crime victims and witnesses in Scott County.
site_details: Call for more information.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 8:30am-4:30pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
Mon-Fri 8:30am-4:30pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
site_eligibility: Victims and witnesses of major crimes in Scott County

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency that partners with local human service organizations, businesses, and government agencies to support and strengthen the community.
service_description: Solicits individual and corporate donations to fund and support partner agencies and programs that address human service needs in Scott County.
site_details: Call or visit the website for information.
site_eligibility: Human services agencies in Scott County

agency_desc: County veterans service officers are veterans employed by the county to act as liaisons with county residents for veteran issues, including but not limited to; providing forms, information, and assistance in obtaining state and federal veterans benefits.
service_description: Provides information about and assistance with veterans' benefits to veterans, their surviving spouses, and their children. County service officers can assist in the completion and submission of forms necessary to receive all appropriate federal and state veterans' benefits.
site_details: Call or walk in for more information.
site_schedule: Tues and Thurs 8:30am-noon and 1pm-4:30pm; Wed by appointment only
site_eligibility: Veteran, surviving spouses or children of a veteran

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Provides low-cost or free immunizations for County youth (through age 18) who are uninsured, whose insurance does not cover the required vaccination, or who are enrolled in Medicaid. Also provides immunizations for American Indians and Alaskan Natives under age 18 regardless of their insurance status. All school-required vaccines are available, as well as the HPV vaccine.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_schedule: Tues 8am-11am and 1pm-4pm; appointments are strongly encouraged
Tues 8am-11am and 1pm-4pm; appointments are strongly encouraged
site_eligibility: Living in Scott County -- Age 2 months-18 years -- Without health insurance -OR- insurance does not cover needed vaccine (including coverage that has capped out) -OR- insured through Medicaid -OR- American Indian or Alaskan Native, regardless of insurance status

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Provides mental and physical health care referrals and care coordination free of charge for HIV positive individuals. Established clients may also be eligible for assistance with food, housing, transportation, employment, legal issues, and other basic needs.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Age 17 or older -- Diagnosed HIV positive

agency_desc: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
service_description: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
site_details: Walk in for emergency care. Call for information.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A nonprofit community organization offering various charitable outreach programs, including financial assistance and food pantry to Scott County residents.
service_description: Provides financial assistance for electric, gas, heating fuel, and water to people in need.
site_details: Call to make an appointment.
site_eligibility: Living in Scott County

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Provides governance and municipal services for the city of Scottsburg in Scott County. Responds to questions, complaints, and requests regarding town government and services.
site_details: Call or walk in during office hours for information.
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 7:30am-3:30pm --  Parks: Daily dawn to dusk, unless otherwise noted
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Scottsburg

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Enforces animal-related ordinances in Scott County, responds to animal-related emergencies, and impounds stray domestic animals. Provides lost-and-found services and adoption for homeless dogs and cats. Also handles dead animal pick-up from public property in Scott County.
site_details: Call for information.
site_schedule: Shelter: Tues-Fri 4pm-6pm; Sat 1pm-3pm -- Animal Control Dispatch: Daily 24 hours
Shelter: Tues-Fri 4pm-6pm; Sat 1pm-3pm -- Animal Control Dispatch: Daily 24 hours
Shelter: Tues-Fri 4pm-6pm; Sat 1pm-3pm -- Animal Control Dispatch: Daily 24 hours

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Austin in Scott County. Persons in need of emergency police assistance should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance. For non-emergency services, call the office during business hours or call Scott County dispatch after hours.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Austin

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement services and maintains the correctional facility for Scott County.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime prevention, and criminal investigation services and administers county correctional facilities in Scott County. A ten-digit dispatch number is provided for nonemergency dispatch calls. For emergency assistance, persons should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency police, fire, or medical assistance. For nonemergency requests or reports, call the office during normal business hours. nonemergency dispatch number.
site_eligibility: Open; serves Scott County

District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information.
site_schedule: Mon, Wed, Fri, and Sat 9am-5pm; Tues and Thurs 9am-6pm
Mon, Wed, Fri, and Sat 9am-5pm; Tues and Thurs 9am-6pm

agency_desc: Provides natural gas service to customers in Clark, Daviess, Greene, Jackson, Jennings, Knox, Monroe, Orange (eastern), Scott, Sullivan, and Washington County.
service_description: Provides natural gas utility service to customers in Clark, Jackson, Jennings, Scott, Washington, and Eastern Orange counties.
site_details: Call or visit the website for information; utility bill can be paid by mail, online, or by phone; a drop box is available at this location.
site_eligibility: Addresses within set boundaries in Clark, Jackson, Jennings, Scott, Washington, and Eastern Orange counties.

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency dedicated to promoting animal welfare.
service_description: Provides shelter for stray and unwanted animals and rehomes animals through adoption.
site_details: Call or visit the Adoption Center to discuss adoption procedures. A pre-adoption form is required.
site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as: Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.
taxonomy_name: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
nameLevel4: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
site_details: Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: MUST LIVE IN TOWNSHIP (Visit www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address to discover township.) -- With financial need based on assessment -- Able to provide documentation of income and expenses for all household members

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency providing comprehensive behavioral health, addiction, and related services.
service_description: Provides assessment and treatment to children facing emotional and behavioral problems. Treatment may include individual counseling, family counseling, group therapy, case management, or psychiatric services.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services

site_eligibility: Living in Scott County -- Youth ages 5-17

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency providing comprehensive behavioral health, addiction, and related services.
service_description: Offers a range of primary medical services (including general and gynecological exams; disease management; laboratory testing; immunizations; family planning; well child services; and nutrition services to patients of all ages.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
service_description: Offers a range of primary medical services (including general, school/sports/employment exams; disease management; laboratory testing; and urgent care for minor illnesses) to patients of all ages.
site_details: Walk in for urgent care or call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A government agency offering recycling services.
site_name: SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA RECYCLING DISTRICT - SCOTT COUNTY
service_description: Provides a drop-off center for recycling paper, cardboard, newspapers, magazines, plastic bottles and jugs (#1-#2), glass, and aluminum/steel cans. This site also has a reuse center where donations of working equipment/tools, household appliances and goods, clothing, books, toys, and other items are offered to anyone at no charge.
site_details: Call or visit the website for information. -- Walk in to drop off approved recyclables. -- Walk in to browse available items in reuse center; take whatever is needed.
site_schedule: Recycling: Tue-Fri 8am-4:15pm and Sat 8am-1:45pm -- Reuse: Tues and Thurs 9am-3pm; Sat 8am-noon
Recycling: Tue-Fri 8am-4:15pm and Sat 8am-1:45pm -- Reuse: Tues and Thurs 9am-3pm; Sat 8am-noon
Recycling: Tue-Fri 8am-4:15pm and Sat 8am-1:45pm -- Reuse: Tues and Thurs 9am-3pm; Sat 8am-noon
Recycling: Tue-Fri 8am-4:15pm and Sat 8am-1:45pm -- Reuse: Tues and Thurs 9am-3pm; Sat 8am-noon
Recycling: Tue-Fri 8am-4:15pm and Sat 8am-1:45pm -- Reuse: Tues and Thurs 9am-3pm; Sat 8am-noon
site_eligibility: Open; serves Scott County

agency_desc: Scott County Emergency Management assists public safety agencies in all types of disasters including natural, technological/man-made and national security emergencies.
service_description: Operates a 24-hour dispatch service for police officers, firefighters, and medics (ambulances) in Scott County. A seven-digit dispatch number is provided for nonemergency dispatch calls. For emergency assistance, persons should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency police, fire, or medical assistance. For nonemergency requests or reports, call the 24-hour, nonemergency dispatch number.
site_eligibility: Open; serves Scott County

agency_desc: The County Clerk maintains records of all civil and criminal court activities; administers jury draw, child support collections, and voter registration; issues marriage licenses; and records state tax liens.
service_description: Issues, provides, and maintains  marriage licenses issued in the county. No witnesses, blood tests, or waiting period are required to obtain one. Both applicants must appear at the time of application. Marriages must take place within 60 days of the marriage license being issued.
taxonomy_name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
nameLevel4: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
site_details: Walk in. Marriage license forms may be completed in advance online or in the clerk's office.
site_schedule: Clerk's Office: Mon-Fri 8:30am-4:30pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
site_eligibility: Marriage license: Both parties at least age 18 (call or visit website for exceptions) -- At least one applicant from this county -OR- both from out of state -- Certified copies: License must have been issued in this county

agency_desc: A government agency that records, files, and preserves all documentation in the realm of property records.
service_description: Maintains a permanent record of real estate deeds, mortgages, mortgage releases, affidavits, and other submitted documents. Makes recorded documents a matter of public record and provides certified copies on request. Also excepts e-recordings.
site_details: Call or walk in for information.
site_eligibility: Open (limited to properties in Scott County)

agency_desc: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Scott County.
service_description: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Scott County, including performing the following duties: Controls, maintains, and supervises county property -- Audits and authorizes claims against the county -- Receives bids for and authorizes county contracts -- Performs certain election functions -- Handles appeals of township trustee decisions
site_details: Call for assistance.
site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Scottsburg in Scott County.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Scottsburg in Scott County. Persons in need of emergency police assistance should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance. For non emergency services, call the office during business hours or call Scott County dispatch after hours.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides emergency fire and medical services for the city of Scottsburg in Scott County.
service_description: Responds to fire, emergency medical, hazardous material, and special rescue situations in the city of Scottsburg in Scott County. Nonemergency services include fire prevention education and public awareness. Persons in need of emergency services should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance. For nonemergency services, call the office during business hours.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Oversees criminal trials, including juvenile cases, in Scott County.
site_details: Varies; cases are generally initiated through the prosecutor's office, private attorneys -- individuals representing themselves. For juror information, contact the court.
site_schedule: Mon, Tues, Thurs, and Fri 8am-4:15pm; Wed 8am-noon
site_eligibility: Persons named in cases or called for jury duty at this court.

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Handles civil lawsuits for $10,000 or less, including contracts, collection of rent, evictions, and personal loans. Only corporations are required to be represented by an attorney and only on claims over $6,000. In Scott County, Superior Court handles small claims cases.
site_details: Walk in for claim forms.
site_schedule: Mon, Tues, Thurs, and Fri 8am-4:15pm; Fri 8am-noon
Mon, Tues, Thurs, and Fri 8am-4:15pm; Fri 8am-noon
site_eligibility: To file a lawsuit: Age 18 or older -- With a civil claim for less than $10,000 -- Meeting one of the following three requirements: Person being sued lives or works in Scott County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit took place in Scott County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit was to be performed in Scott County

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Provides probation services for the Scott County Circuit and Superior Courts, including supervising juvenile and adult offenders in the community and linking them with programs and services to support their rehabilitation.
site_details: Through the courts; call for details.
site_eligibility: Offenders assigned to probation by the Scott County Courts
